detail_desc: Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with an opening and narrow ties at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey inner dress.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes. Diameter 1.1 cm to 4 cm.

Set with a dungaree dress and top in organic cotton. Pattern-weave dress with an elasticated waist, patch pockets and adjustable straps with knots at the front and fasteners at the back. Short-sleeved jersey top with an opening and button at the back of the neck and frill-trimmed sleeves.
Block-heeled ankle boots with a zip on the inside. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Sports tights in patterned, fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband for a more comfortable fit.
Metal earrings decorated with plastic beads and pompoms. Length 6 cm.
Long, 5-pocket denim shorts with a regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and slim legs.

Short, fitted dress in a linen and viscose weave. Concealed zip at the back with a hook-and-eye fastening at the top and long, raglan balloon sleeves with gathered seams front and back and close-fitting cuffs with concealed buttons. Satin lining.
Flared leggings in jersey. High waist with covered elastication, and a slit at the hems.
Trainers in soft imitation leather with a hook and loop tab at the front and loop at the back. Soft terry linings and insoles and soft soles.

Jacket in a viscose weave with a sheen. Shawl collar, covered buttons at the front and long sleeves with wide cuffs. Detachable belt at the waist, and decorative piping at the front and cuffs. Unlined.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in a patterned linen and cotton weave with a draped knot detail at the front, concealed zip at the back and 3/4-length, wide legs.
Thin, elastic hairband decorated with fabric flowers.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with a print motif, narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.
Leather gloves. The tops of the thumb, index finger and middle finger have been treated to make them touchscreen-compatible. Lined.
Jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft with a visible felted lining at the top and lacing at the front. Zip in one side, a loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Felted linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded top edge, sections in woven fabric, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket, contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Checked suit trousers in a woven wool blend with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with terry inside.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with woven details, a collar with a sewn-on bow tie, and button placket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and press-studs at the crotch.
Cotton jersey T-shirt with a deep, raw-edge neckline and short sleeves with raw edges.
Short-sleeved dress in sheer mesh with a sewn-in jersey underdress with a glow-in-the-dark print on the front. Seam at the waist, gently flared skirt and raw edges at the sleeves and hem.
Short, A-line dress in an airy cotton weave with a frill-trimmed Peter Pan collar and buttons down the front. Short, lined puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Hard smartphone case. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.

Short dress in a jacquard weave with a slight sheen. Double-layered stand-up collar and an opening at the back with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Short, raglan puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and a seam at the waist with a narrow drawstring that ties at the back. Lined.
Cropped top in a crinkled weave with decorative buttons at the front, narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and smocking at the top and hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

T-shirt and joggers set with print motifs. Classic T-shirt in cotton jersey. Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide, easy pull-on, elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Relaxed style with a low crotch, welt pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and ribbed hems.

Short sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, mesh key pocket in the waistband and short slits at the hems. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Narrow metal snake chain waist belt with moulded ends in the shape of a head and tail. Length 98 cm.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy weave. High waist with elasticated smocking, side pockets and straight, wide legs. Lined.
Twill trousers with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and detachable belt. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
V-neck T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with creases, a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Off-the-shoulder maxi dress in soft viscose jersey with a heavy drape. Short sleeves, elastication and a wide flounce at the top, an elasticated seam below the bust and gently flared skirt with high slits at the front. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Leggings in stretch jersey with an imitation leather finish. Regular waist with covered elastication.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, a wrapover front, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Hooded jacket in soft pile with appliqués and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Unlined.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Blouse in airy chiffon with a pleated collar, V-neck opening at the front with ties at the top, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in washed superstretch twill with a regular waist and skinny legs.

prod_name: Khloe high leg high waist bott
detail_desc: Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey with a high waist, lined gusset, high-cut legs and half-string back.
Sports shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and reflective details.
Short, sleeveless nightslip in softly draping satin with a V-neck at the front and a slightly deeper, lace-trimmed V-neck at the back. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a V-neck at the back and buttons down the back. Gathered seam and decorative bow at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with decorative buttons.

Long jacket in washed, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a raw-edge, drawstring hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Pockets in the side seams and an asymmetric hem with a slit in one side.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Backpack in a quilted weave with a shimmering metallic finish. Handle and a zip at the top, adjustable, padded shoulder straps and a zipped outer compartment. The zips have heart-shaped tabs. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester. Depth 9 cm. Width 27 cm. Height 34 cm.
Boxy jumper in a soft, fluffy rib knit with a polo neck and low dropped shoulders.

A-line maxi dress in an airy patterned weave. Narrow cut at the top with a V-shaped opening and small frilled collar with a decorative drawstring and long ties at the front. Gathered seam at the knees for added width. Jersey lining. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides with decorative straps, and a string back.
Sandals with hook and loop fastenings. Moulded, imitation suede insoles and fluted soles.
Leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Swim trousers and top in textured, UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Trainers in leather with suede details, a padded top edge and tongue and lacing. Leather linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles.
Gently flared top in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hairband in woven fabric with a decorative knot at the front and covered elastic at the back.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
Fitted, polo-neck jersey top with long sleeves.
Small bag in grained imitation leather with a metal chain shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size approx. 4.5x14x19.5 cm.
Fine-knit cotton dress with short sleeves.
Blouse in an airy weave with a flounce at the front, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Large metal earrings decorated with sparkly glass stones. Length 6.5 cm.
